main event: Pieces of tinfoil recovered in Northern Ohio forwarded for analysis.
interesting points: The material was identified as chaff made of aluminum foil used by the Air Force., The object was reported to have fallen from the skies and could not have dropped from any means of aerial transportation., The sample was submitted by a civilian for evaluation to the Air Technical Intelligence Center., It affects and confuses radar when deployed from an aircraft., The analysis demonstrated that the material is frequently found in areas where military training occurs.
